headline: Dow Inc. Posts Another Quarterly Loss. Why the Stock Is Surging Anyway.
summary: Thursday morning, Dow reported an adjusted per-share loss of 19 cents from sales of $10 billion. Wall Street was looking for a 31-cent loss from sales of $10.2 billion.

raw.headline: Dow Inc. Posts Another Quarterly Loss. Why the Stock Is Surging Anyway.
raw.summary: Thursday morning, Dow reported an adjusted per-share loss of 19 cents from sales of $10 billion. Wall Street was looking for a 31-cent loss from sales of $10.2 billion.

headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Tesla, IBM, D-Wave Quantum, Dow Inc., Molina Healthcare, Las Vegas Sands, Southwest, and More
summary: Tesla rises and IBM falls after reporting quarterly earnings, while quantum-computing stocks soar on a report the Trump administration is considering taking equity stakes in several companies in exchange for federal funding. The Commerce Department denied the report.

headline: American Airlines, Honeywell, Dow: Latest earnings in focus
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including American Airlines (AAL) reporting a loss in its third quarter while forecasting full-year profits, Honeywell (HON) also raising its full-year outlook after its earnings received a boost from its aerospace division, and Dow Inc. (DOW) sharing a narrower-than-expected loss in its latest quarter. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Dow beats Q3 earnings estimates, revenue declines
summary: Investing.com -- Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) reported better-than-expected third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, though revenue fell short of analyst projections amid continued industry-wide pressure.

headline: Dow Inc.: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Midland, Michigan-based company said it had profit of 8 cents. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to 19 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Dow Inc.: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Midland, Michigan-based company said it had profit of 8 cents. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to 19 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.
